ValidationRule.description: need referral contact name when Referral - Private Equity, Referral - Insurance Broker Lead Source is used updated - case #30067999
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(OR(ISNEW(),ISCHANGED(LeadSource)), OR(ISPICKVAL(LeadSource, "Referral-Private Equity"), ISPICKVAL(LeadSource, "Referral-Insurance Broker")), NOT(BEGINS($Profile.Name, 'NSS')), ISBLANK(Referral_Contact__c))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: *** You Must Enter The Referral Contact Name *** Remember to click the Magnifying Glass icon to complete the selection
